GSP27motik_2u:1: [dvau huḍāv iva yudhyete puruṣārthau samāsamau / ātmīyaś cānyadīyaś ca jaya]ty atibalas tayoḥ //MU_2,5.5//
GSP27motik_2u:2: samāsamau arthānarthotpādakatvāt samaviṣamau / ātmīyaḥ ucchāstraḥ / anyadīyaḥ śāstroktaḥ
GSP27motik_2u:3: iti / dvau puruṣārthau huḍāv iva yudhyete yuddhaṃ kurutaḥ / tatrāpi samaḥ śāstroktaḥ /
GSP27motik_2u:4: asamaḥ ucchāstra iti vibhāgaḥ / tatra tayoḥ dvayoḥ puruṣārthayoḥ madhye / atibalo
GSP27motik_2u:7: anarthaḥ prāpyate yatra śāstritād api pauruṣāt / anarthakaṃ tu balavat tatra jñeyaṃ svapauruṣam //MU_2,5.6//
GSP27motik_2u:8: yatra puruṣeṇa śāstritād api pauruṣāt anarthaḥ prāpyate tatra anarthakam anarthotpādakaṃ
GSP27motik_2u:9: svapauruṣam aśāstrīyaṃ pauruṣaṃ / balavaj jñeyam / tanmadhye praviṣṭād balavataḥ
GSP27motik_2u:10: svapauruṣād evāsau anartha utpanna iti jñeyam iti bhāvaḥ / arthāt tu yatra anarthaḥ
GSP27motik_2u:11: na prāpyate tatra śāstrīyam eva balavaj jñeyam / dvayoḥ pauruṣayoś ca sarvatra sandhir
GSP27motik_2u:14: paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya dantair dantān vicūrṇayan / śubhenāśubham udyuktaḥ prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ jayet //MU_2,5.7//
GSP27motik_2u:15: paraṃ pauruṣam śāstroktaṃ pauruṣam / udyuktaḥ udyogayuktaḥ / prāktanaṃ pauruṣam vāsanākhyam
GSP27motik_2u:16: prāktanam / api śubhaṃ śubhakāry eva / yataḥ śubhā vāsanaiva mokṣadāyinī proktety
GSP27motik_2u:18: prāktanaḥ puruṣārtho 'sau māṃ niyojayatīti dhīḥ / balād adhaspadīkāryā pratyakṣād adhikā na sā //MU_2,5.8//
GSP27motik_2u:19: pratyakṣeṇa tu pauruṣasyaiva niyojane sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭam ity etad abhipretya pratyakṣād adhikā na sety uktam //MT_2,5.8//
GSP27motik_2u:20: tāvat tāvat prayatnena yatitavyaṃ svapauruṣaṃ / prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ yāvad aśubhaṃ śāmyati svayam //MU_2,5.9//
GSP27motik_2u:21: svapauruṣaṃ yatitavyam śāstrānusāreṇa svaviṣayaṃ prati yatnayuktaṃ kāryaṃ / yatitavyam iti ṇicyuktaḥ prayogaḥ //MT_2,5.9//
GSP27motik_2u:22: doṣaḥ śāmyaty asandehaṃ prāktano 'dyatanair guṇaiḥ / dṛṣṭānto 'tra hyastanasya doṣasyādyaguṇaiḥ kṣayaḥ //MU_2,5.10//
GSP27motik_2u:24: asaddaivam adhaḥ kṛtvā nityam udyuktayā dhiyā / saṃsārottaraṇaṃ bhūtyai yatetādhātum ātmani //MU_2,5.11//
GSP27motik_2u:26: na gantavyam anudyogaiḥ sāmyaṃ puruṣagardabhaiḥ / udyogas tu yathāśāstraṃ lokadvitayasiddhaye //MU_2,5.12//
GSP27motik_2u:28: saṃsārakuharād asmān nirgantavyaṃ svayaṃ balāt / pauruṣaṃ yatnam āśritya hariṇevāripañjarāt //MU_2,5.13//
GSP27motik_2u:29: saṃsārakuharāt saṃsāraśvabhrāt / hariṇā siṃhena / aripañjarāt aribhūtāt pañjarāt //MT_2,5.13//
GSP27motik_2u:30: pratyahaṃ pratyavekṣeta naraś caritam ātmanaḥ / saṃtyajet paśubhis tulyaṃ śrayet satpuruṣocitam //MU_2,5.14//
GSP27motik_2u:32: kiṃcitkāntānnapānādikalilaṃ komalaṃ gṛhe / vraṇe kīṭa ivāsvādya vayaḥ kāryaṃ na bhasmasāt //MU_2,5.15//
GSP27motik_2u:33: kalilaṃ pāpajanakam / komalaṃ āmukhe komalatayā pratibhāsamānam / vraṇe randhre //MT_2,5.15//
GSP27motik_2u:34: śubhena pauruṣeṇāśu śubham āsādyate phalam / aśubhenāśubhaṃ nityaṃ daivaṃ nāma na kiṃcana //MU_2,5.16//
GSP27motik_2u:36: pratyakṣadṛṣṭam utsṛjya yo 'numānamanās tv asau / svabhujābhyām imau sarpāv iti prekṣya palāyatām //MU_2,5.17//
GSP27motik_2u:38: daivaṃ saṃprerayati mām iti mugdhadhiyāṃ mukham / adṛṣṭaśreṣṭhadṛṣṭīnāṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmīr nivartate //MU_2,5.18//
GSP27motik_2u:39: adṛṣṭā / śreṣṭhā uttamā / dṛṣṭiḥ pauruṣākhyā dṛṣṭiḥ / yaiḥ teṣām //MT_2,5.18//
GSP27motik_2u:40: tasmāt puruṣayatnena vivekaṃ pūrṇam āśrayet / ātmajñānamahārthāni śāstrāṇi pravicārayet //MU_2,5.19//
GSP27motik_2u:41: ātmajñānam eva mahān arthaḥ yeṣāṃ tāni //MT_2,5.19//
GSP27motik_2u:42: citte cintayatām arthaṃ yathāśāstraṃ nijehitaiḥ / asaṃsādhayatām eva mūḍhānāṃ dhig durīpsitam //MU_2,5.20//
GSP27motik_2u:44: pauruṣaṃ ca na cānantaṃ na yatnam abhivāñchate / na yatnenāpi mahatā tailam āsādyate 'śmanaḥ //MU_2,5.21//
GSP27motik_2u:45: pauruṣam anantaṃ antarahitaṃ / na ca bhavati / kiṃ tu niyatam eva bhavati / pauruṣaṃ
GSP27motik_2u:46: kartṛ / yatnam na abhivāñchate na svotpādakatvena kāṅkṣate / yatnena svasya niyamaṃ
GSP27motik_2u:47: na laṅghayati iti yāvat / puruṣo mahatāpi yatnena svasmin niyataṃ pauruṣaṃ na laṅghayituṃ
GSP27motik_2u:48: śaknotīti bhāvaḥ / etad dṛṣṭāntena sugamaṃ karoti / na yatneneti //MT_2,5.21 //
GSP27motik_2u:50: yathā ghaṭaḥ parimito yathā parimitaḥ paṭaḥ / niyataḥ parimāṇasthaḥ puruṣārthas tathaiva vaḥ //MU_2,5.22//
GSP27motik_2u:51: ataḥ svapauruṣāviṣaye ākāśagamanādau na yatitavyam iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,5.22//
GSP27motik_2u:52: sa ca śāstrārthasatsaṅgasamācārair nijaṃ phalam / dadātīti svabhāvo 'yam anyathānarthasiddhaye //MU_2,5.23//
GSP27motik_2u:54: svarūpaṃ pauruṣasyaitad daivaṃ vyavaharan naraḥ / yāti niṣphalayatnatvaṃ na kadācana kaścana //MU_2,5.24//
GSP27motik_2u:55: pauruṣasya svarūpam daivam vyavaharan daivam iti nāmnā vyavaharan / na tu paramārthato daivam iti jānann iti yāvat //MT_2,5.24//
GSP27motik_2u:56: dainyadāridryaduḥkhārtā apy anye puruṣottamāḥ / pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena yātā devendratulyatām //MU_2,5.25//
GSP27motik_2u:58: ā bālyāc caivam abhyastaiḥ śāstrasatsaṅgamādibhiḥ / guṇaiḥ puruṣayatnena svo 'rthaḥ saṃprāpyate hi taiḥ //MU_2,5.26//
GSP27motik_2u:59: svo 'rthaḥ mokṣākhyaḥ kāṅkṣito 'rthaḥ / puruṣeṇeti śeṣaḥ / hiśabdaḥ niścaye / taiḥ prasiddhaiḥ guṇair iti karaṇe tṛtīyā / yatneneti tu hetau
GSP27motik_2u:61: iti pwratyakṣato dṛṣṭam anubhūtaṃ kṛtaṃ śrutam / daivottham iti manyante ye hatās te kubuddhayaḥ //MU_2,5.27//
GSP27motik_2u:62: kṛtam śrutam anuṣṭhitam / sarvam daivāt uttham asti / iti ye manyante / te kubuddhayaḥ hatāḥ naṣṭāḥ //MT_2,5.27//
GSP27motik_2u:63: ālasyaṃ yadi na bhavej jagaty anarthaḥ ko na syād bahudhaniko bahuśruto vā / ālasyād iyam avaniḥ sasāgarāntā saṃpūrṇā narapaśubhiś ca nirdhanaiś ca //MU_2,5.28//
GSP27motik_2u:64: narapaśubhiḥ ajñānibhiḥ / nirdhanaiḥ daridraiḥ / tasmād dhanakāṅkṣibhiḥ mokṣakāṅkṣibhir vā pauruṣam eva kāryam iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,5.28//
GSP27motik_2u:66: bālye gate 'viratakalpitakelilole paugaṇḍamaṇḍanavayaḥprabhṛti prayatnāt / satsaṅgamaiḥ padapadārthavibuddhabuddhiḥ kuryān naraḥ svaguṇadoṣavicāraṇāni
GSP27motik_2u:67: avirataṃ kalpitā yā keliḥ / tayā lole bālye / bālabhāve gate sati / puruṣaḥ paugaṇḍasyāvasthāviśeṣasya
GSP27motik_2u:68: maṇḍanabhūtaṃ yat vayaḥ / tataḥ prabhṛti yauvanāt prabhṛti iti yāvat / prayatnāt
GSP27motik_2u:69: yatnena / svaguṇadoṣavicāraṇāni kuryāt / kaiḥ kṛtvā / satsaṅgamaiḥ sādhusaṅgamaiḥ /
GSP27motik_2u:70: satsaṅgamābhāve hi svaguṇadoṣavicāraṇam aśakyakriyam eva / puruṣaḥ kathaṃbhūtaḥ /
GSP27motik_2u:71: padapadārthavibuddhabuddhiḥ / padapadārthayoḥ vibuddhā buddhiḥ yasya / tādṛśaḥ /
GSP27motik_2u:73: śrīvālmīkiḥ sargāntaślokena bharadvājaṃ prati tatratyaṃ dināvasānaṃ kathayati
GSP27motik_2u:74: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma / snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma
GSP27motik_2u:75: munau vasiṣṭhe / iti evam / uktavati sati / divasaḥ jagāma avasānaṃ gataḥ / yataḥ
GSP27motik_2u:76: inaḥ sūryaḥ / astaṃ jagāma / sabhā dāśarathī sabhā / kṛtanamaskaraṇā kṛtamuninamaskārā
GSP27motik_2u:77: satī / sāyantanāya vidhaye sāyaṃ sandhyārthaṃ / snātuṃ jagāma / sā sabhā śyāmākṣaye
GSP27motik_2u:78: rātrikṣaye / ravikaraiḥ sūryakaraiḥ / saha ājagāma ca / iti śivam //MT_2,5.30 //
GSP27motik_2u:79: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe pañcamaḥ sargaḥ // 2,5 //
GSP27motik_2u:80: prabhāte śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ śrīrāmaṃ prati pūrvasargoktavastuphalitaṃ kathayati
GSP27motik_2u:81: tasmāt prākpauruṣaṃ daivaṃ nānyat tat projjhya dūrataḥ / sādhusaṅgamasacchāstrair jīvam uttārayed balāt //MU_2,6.1//
GSP27motik_2u:82: tasmāt pūrvasargoktāt hetoḥ / prākpauruṣaṃ prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ / daivam bhavati /
GSP27motik_2u:83: anyat pauruṣād bhinnaṃ kiṃcid daivam / na bhavati / ataḥ puruṣaḥ tat daivaṃ / dūrataḥ
GSP27motik_2u:84: projjhya arthāt adyatanaṃ śubhaṃ pauruṣam āśritya / sādhusaṅgamasacchāstraiḥ hetubhūtaiḥ /
GSP27motik_2u:85: jīvam balāt haṭhena / uttārayet / saṃsārād iti śeṣaḥ //MT_2,6.1 //
GSP27motik_2u:86: yathā yathā prayatnaḥ syād bhaved āśu phalaṃ tathā / iti pauruṣam evāsti daivam astu tad eva vaḥ //MU_2,6.2//
GSP27motik_2u:87: prayatnaḥ pauruṣam / tat yuṣmābhiḥ aṅgīkṛtaṃ daivam / vaḥ eva yuṣmākam evāstu //MT_2,6.2//
GSP27motik_2u:88: duḥkhād yathā duḥkhakāle hā kaṣṭam iti kathyate / hākaṣṭaśabdaparyāyas tathā hā daivam ity api //MU_2,6.3//
GSP27motik_2u:89: tathā hā kaṣṭam itivat hā daivam iti dīnānām evoktir astīti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,6.3//
GSP27motik_2u:90: prāksvakarmetarākāraṃ daivaṃ nāma na vidyate / bālaḥ prabalapuṃseva taj jetum iva śakyate //MU_2,6.4//
GSP27motik_2u:91: prāksvakarmaṇaḥ prāktanasvakarmaṇaḥ / itarākāram daivaṃ nāma na vidyate / prāktanāt
GSP27motik_2u:92: svakarmaṇaḥ pṛthaksattāṃ na bhajate ity arthaḥ / ataḥ puṃsā tat daivaṃ / jetuṃ śakyate
GSP27motik_2u:93: keneva / prabalapuṃsā iva / yathā tena bālo jetuṃ śakyate tathety arthaḥ //MT_2,6.4 //
GSP27motik_2u:94: hyastano duṣṭa ācāra ācāreṇādya cāruṇā / yathāśu śubhatāṃ yāti prāktanaṃ kukṛtaṃ tathā //MU_2,6.5//
GSP27motik_2u:95: adyācāreṇa adya kṛtenācāreṇa / tathā tadvat / prāktanaṃ kukṛtam adyatanena sukṛtena śubhatāṃ yāti //MT_2,6.5//
GSP27motik_2u:96: tajjayāya yatante ye na lābhalavalampaṭāḥ / te mūḍhāḥ prākṛtā dīnāḥ sthitā daivaparāyaṇāḥ //MU_2,6.6//
GSP27motik_2u:97: tajjayāya kuvāsanārūpaprāktanāśubhapauruṣajayāya / lābhalave sāṃsārikapadārthāptirūpe lābhaleśe / laṃpaṭāh lobhayuktāḥ / prākṛtāḥ nīcāḥ //MT_2,6.6//
GSP27motik_2u:98: pauruṣeṇa kṛtaṃ karma daivād yad abhinaśyati / tatra nāśayitur jñeyaṃ pauruṣaṃ balavattaram //MU_2,6.7//
GSP27motik_2u:100: yad ekavṛntaphalayor apy ekaṃ śūnyakoṭaram / tatra prayatnaḥ sphuritas tathā tadrasasaṃvidaḥ //MU_2,6.8//
GSP27motik_2u:101: ekasmin vṛnte sthitau phalau ekavṛntaphalau / tayoḥ api madhyāt ekaphalaṃ śūnyakoṭaram
GSP27motik_2u:102: sārarahitamadhyaṃ yat bhavati / arthāt dvitīyaṃ sārabharitamadhyaṃ jñeyam / tatra
GSP27motik_2u:103: tasmin sthāne / tadrasasaṃvidaḥ tayoḥ phalayoḥ yā rasarūpā saṃvit / tasyāḥ tadrasasyeti
GSP27motik_2u:104: yāvat / tathā tena prakāreṇa / yatnaḥ pauruṣaṃ sphuritaḥ / raseneva tādṛśaṃ pauruṣaṃ
GSP27motik_2u:105: kṛtaṃ yenaikaṃ phalaṃ sārarahitaṃ saṃpannaṃ / na tv anyaśaṅkitasya daivasyātra kāpi
GSP27motik_2u:107: yat prayānti jagadbhāvāḥ saṃsiddhā api saṃkṣayam / kṣayakārakayatnasya tatra jñeyaṃ mahad balam //MU_2,6.9//
GSP27motik_2u:108: kṣayakārakasya nāśakartuḥ kālasya / yaḥ yatnaḥ pauruṣam / tasya //MT_2,6.9//
GSP27motik_2u:109: bhikṣuko maṅgalebhena nṛpo yat kriyate balāt / tad amātyebhapaurāṇāṃ prayatnasya mahat phalam //MU_2,6.10//
GSP27motik_2u:110: maṅgalebhena maṅgalahastinā / bhikṣukaḥ nṛpaḥ rājā / balāt yat kriyate amātyebhapaurāṇāṃ
GSP27motik_2u:113: pauruṣenānnam ākramya yathā dantair vicūrṇyate / alpaṃ pauruṣam ākramya tathā śūreṇa cūrṇyate //MU_2,6.11//
GSP27motik_2u:114: yathā dantaiḥ pauruṣeṇa annam ākramya svavaśīkṛtya / cūrṇyate / tathā śūreṇādyatanapauruṣayuktena
GSP27motik_2u:115: puruṣeṇa / alpaṃ prāktanatvena jīrṇaprāyaṃ / pauruṣaṃ ākramya cūrṇyate //MT_2,6.11 //
GSP27motik_2u:116: anubhūtaṃ hi mahatāṃ lāghavaṃ yatnaśālināṃ / yatheṣṭaṃ viniyujyante te taiḥ karmasu loṣṭavat //MU_2,6.12//
GSP27motik_2u:117: hi yasmāt / asmābhiḥ yatnaśālināṃ pauruṣaśālināṃ / mahatāṃ lāghavaṃ cāturyam / anubhūtaṃ
GSP27motik_2u:118: pratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭam / kathaṃ anubhūtam ity / atrāha / yatheṣṭam iti / yataḥ taiḥ yatnaśālibhiḥ /
GSP27motik_2u:119: te arthāt pauruṣarahitāḥ puruṣāḥ / yatheṣṭaṃ svecchānusāreṇa / loṣṭavat karmasu viniyujyante //MT_2,6.12 //
GSP27motik_2u:120: śaktasya pauruṣaṃ dṛśyam adṛśyaṃ vāpi yad bhavet / tad daivam ity aśaktena buddham ātmany abuddhinā //MU_2,6.13//
GSP27motik_2u:121: śaktasya mahatā pauruṣeṇa yuktasya / dṛśyasya puruṣāder adṛśyasya kālādeś ca / dṛśyam
GSP27motik_2u:122: adṛśyaṃ vā yat pauruṣaṃ bhavet / abuddhinā samyagjñānarahitena / aśaktena tadapekṣayā
GSP27motik_2u:123: śaktirahitena puruṣeṇa / tat śaktasya pauruṣam / ātmani svasmin viṣaye / daivaṃ buddham
GSP27motik_2u:124: jñātam / anyathā daivena me kṛtam iti na brūyāt //MT_2,6.13 //
GSP27motik_2u:125: bhūtānāṃ balavadbhūtayatno daivam iti sthitam / tasthuṣām apy adhiṣṭhātṛvatām etat sphuṭaṃ mithaḥ //MU_2,6.14//
GSP27motik_2u:126: balavadbhūtayatnaḥ / bhūtānām kṣudrabhūtānāṃ upari / daivam iti sthitam bhavati /
GSP27motik_2u:127: puruṣo hi yatra na paryāpto bhavati tatraiva daivena me kṛtam iti kathayati / na
GSP27motik_2u:128: kevalam etan mayaiva jñātaṃ kiṃtv anyair apīty āha / tasthuṣām iti / apiśabdaḥ samuccaye /
GSP27motik_2u:129: mithaḥ anyo'nyam / adhiṣṭhātṛvatāṃ tasthuṣām prerakayuktānāṃ sthitānām puruṣāṇām
GSP27motik_2u:130: api / etat mayā uktaḥ arthaḥ / sphuṭaṃ prakaṭo bhavati / te hi parasparaṃ kṣudrataratamādibhedenādhiṣṭheyāḥ
GSP27motik_2u:131: bhavanti / utkṛṣṭataratamādibhedena tv adhiṣṭhātāraḥ / adhiṣṭhātā eva cādhiṣṭheyaṃ
GSP27motik_2u:132: prati daivam / ataḥ eteṣu madukto 'rthaḥ sphuṭa eva bhavati iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,6.14 //
GSP27motik_2u:134: śāstramātyebhapaurāṇām avikalpyā svabhāvadhīḥ / sā yā bhikṣukarājyasya kartrī dhartrī prajāsthiteḥ //MU_2,6.15//
GSP27motik_2u:135: śāstā purohitaḥ / sa ca amātyaś ca / ibhaś ca maṅgalahastī ca / paurāś ca / teṣām /
GSP27motik_2u:136: sā svabhāvadhīḥ svabhāvāt utthitā bhikṣurājyadānarūpā buddhiḥ / avikalpyā nāśayitum

GSP27motik_2u:870: saṃsāradṛṣṭināśadvāreṇa viśrāmaḥ / na bhavet / tat tadā / asyāṃ etādṛgduḥkharūpāyāṃ /
